extension.searchTitle: To ensure the payment of interest and principal of the debt of the United States.;Default Prevention Act;H.R. 692 (RH)

titleInfo.title: To ensure the payment of interest and principal of the debt of the United States.

extension.officialTitle: To ensure the payment of interest and principal of the debt of the United States.
extension.action: Mr. McClintock (for himself, Mr. Poe of Texas, Mr. Pittenger, Mr. Garrett, Mr. Duncan of Tennessee, Mr. Fleischmann, Mr. Olson, Mr. Brat, Mr. Yoho, Mr. Mulvaney, Mr. Pearce, Mrs. Black, Mr. Duncan of South Carolina, Mrs. Blackburn, Mr. DeSantis, Mr. Roe of Tennessee, Mr. Chabot, Mr. Rothfus, Mr. Brady of Texas, Mr. Cramer, Mr. Hensarling, Mr. Lamborn, Mr. Gibbs, Mr. Westerman, Mrs. Ellmers, Mr. Blum, Mr. Woodall, Mr. LaMalfa, Mr. Wilson of South Carolina, Mr. Fleming, Mr. Brooks of Alabama, Mr. Austin Scott of Georgia, Mr. Franks of Arizona, Mr. Wittman, Mr. Barr, Mr. Loudermilk, Mr. Rouzer, Mr. Stewart, Mr. Flores, Mr. Yoder, Mr. Rice of South Carolina, Mr. Nunnelee, Mr. King of Iowa, and Mr. Salmon) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

Additional sponsors: Mr. Forbes, Mr. Johnson of Ohio, Mr. Buck, Mr. Tipton, Mr. Emmer of Minnesota, Mr. Zinke, Mr. Young of Iowa, Mrs. Hartzler, Mr. Messer, Mr. Jordan, Mr. Cole, Mr. Hudson, Mrs. Lummis, Mr. Meadows, Ms. Foxx, Mr. Sanford, Mr. Tom Price of Georgia, Mr. Rokita, Mr. Schweikert, Mr. Graves of Georgia, Mr. Rohrabacher, Mr. Sessions, Mr. Bishop of Utah, Mr. Wenstrup, Mr. Harris, Mr. Barton, Mr. Conaway, Mr. Stutzman, Mr. Miller of Florida, Mr. Gowdy, Mr. Chaffetz, Mr. Duffy, Mr. Pitts, Mr. Kline, Mr. Babin, Mr. Posey, Mr. Ribble, Mr. Pompeo, Mr. Mullin, Mr. Benishek, Mr. Thornberry, Mr. Lucas, Mr. Scalise, Mr. Mooney of West Virginia, Mrs. Wagner, Mr. Collins of Georgia, Mr. Gosar, Mr. Roskam, Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, Mr. Latta, Mr. Neugebauer, Mr. Luetkemeyer, Mr. Walberg, Mr. McKinley, Mr. Hultgren, Mr. DesJarlais, Mr. Labrador, Mr. Clawson of Florida, Mr. Grothman, Mr. Walker, Mrs. Roby, Mr. Long, Mr. Collins of New York, Mr. Sam Johnson of Texas, Mr. Guthrie, Ms. Jenkins of Kansas, Mr. Palmer, Mr. Bishop of Michigan, and Mr. Goodlatte
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
